name: Blockjam
description:
Blockjam - Made in 8 hours for SMU  Game Jam 2022

The goal of this game is to reach the end of each level without touching any white blocks. Do this by collecting coins in each level to purchase movement skills from the skill tree. Make sure to think carefully about what to buy, it is easy to get stuck with no money if you make the wrong choices.

Enjoy! Discord Henmin#1980 for any comments or questions

Instructions:

Unzip file and run Jam3.exe
